title: （新手求助）全球市场与老板商店冲突吗。
author: wsfjm
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wsfjm 于 2014-10-29 20:43 编辑 

服务端版本号：（spigot 1.7.10）
BossShop版本号 ：（2.1.0）
GlobalMarket版本号：（1.3.0-SNAPSHOT-b1）
换了个版本之后。打开居然有BUG.买东西不花钱，
目前的版本1.3.0症状：用命令输入 /market listings打开市场完全没问题。
用老板商店开设用户命令输入就出问题了。打开之后是空白的啥东西都没有。
疑问：为什么用指令很正常，用BossSTOP打开就异常？
如何解决！

replies.author: wsfjm
replies.txt_content:
363127537 发表于 2014-10-29 20:17
并不会冲突 亲测
老外这句话是什么意思
I have successfully troubleshot our BossShop plugin. It was having an issue with not hooking into Vault, meaning there was no way for players to be able to utilize the shop with econ.

Since this issue has been resolved, shops can now be created in the Rebirth Shop which will allow players to utilize in game economy.

As an overview, players may kill mobs to collect coins. These coins can be used either as a physical item-based currency, or may be traded in the bank for econ. Funds are 100% fungible. Coins will always equal their exact value in econ and vice versa.
